c74object.name: maxscore.parse
c74object.description:
maxscore.parse
is an Max abstration that parses
com.algomusic.max.MaxScore
XML data, converts them into Max messages and groups them according to functional groups.If all message outlets are connected to a second MaxScore object, an identical copy of the first score will be generated. Besides message output, every other outlet offers an index number which could be used to filter particular events to programmatically manipulate a score. Use
maxscore.parse2
if your score contains gracenotes.

objarg.name: defaults
objarg.description:
When defaults are set to 1
maxscore.parse
will send default values for measure, note and interval attributes; defaults 0 will only create a message when the value for a attribute differs from the default. For notes and intervals an addNote/addInterval message will created instead of individual setDuration, setPitch, setAmplitude, setHold messages. Defaults needs to be 0, if a new score is supposed to be created from the output of
maxscore.parse
. In addition, setPreviousBeamedOut is sent instead of setBeamedOut.

objarg.name: measureWidth
objarg.description: With measureWidth set to 0 (default), the setMeasureWidth message will be suppressed.

objarg.name: countMeasuresFromZero
objarg.description: With @countMeasuresFromZero set to 0 (default), parsed measure indexes correspond to the current measure numbers, with the the value to 1, the parsed measure indexes always start with 0.

objarg.name: dict
objarg.description: Specify the name of a MaxScore dict to be parsed with the getTree message.

objarg.name: useUserOffset
objarg.description: With @useUserOffset set to 1, maxscore.parse will add an offset specified by the offset message to the measure numbers displayed by canvas or bcanvas.

method.name: symbol
method.description:
parses
com.algomusic.max.MaxScore
XML data generated in response to info queries into Max messages

method.name: enddump
method.description:
MaxScore's XML dumps are framed by the startdump and
enddump
messages. They are being used by
maxscore.parse
to reset the abstraction and trigger the parser.

method.name: startdump
method.description:
MaxScore's XML dumps are framed by the startdump and
enddump
messages. They are being used by
maxscore.parse
to reset the abstraction and trigger the parser.

method.name: getTree
method.description: Triggers the parsing of MaxScore dicts specified by the dict argument/message.

method.name: offset
method.digest: Add an offset to measure numbers
method.description: Specifies the offset to be added (or subtracted if offset<0) to the measure numbers displayed by canvas/bcanvas

entry.name: message
entry.description: Out left outlet: Grace note attributes

entry.name: message
entry.description: Out second outlet: Grace note index

entry.name: message
entry.description: Out right outlet: Additional attributes that don't translate into MaxScore messages
